message: Han Solo.
I'm captain of the Millennium Falcon.
Chewie here told me you're looking for passage to the Alderaan system.

nodes.message: Fast ship? You've never heard of the Millennium Falcon?

message: It's the ship that made the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs.
I've outrun Imperial starships, not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I'm talking about the big Corellian ships now.
She's fast enough for you, old man.
What's the cargo?
__laughs__
What is it? Some kind of local trouble?
Well, that's the real trick, isn't it? And it's going to cost you something extra.
Ten thousand, all in advance.
But who's going to fly it kid?
You?

nodes.message: Seventeen?

message: Okay. You guys got yourself a ship.
We'll leave as soon as you're ready.
Docking Bay 94.
Yes, Greedo. As a matter of fact, I was just going to see your boss.
Tell Jabba I've got his money.

nodes.message: Yeah, but this time I've got the money.

message: __raises voice__
I don't have it with me. Tell Jabba...

nodes.message: Even I get boarded sometimes. You think I had a choice?
Over my dead body.

message: Yes, I bet you have.
__shoots!__
Sorry about the mess.
__tosses coin to bartender__
But I got a nice easy charter now.
I'll pay you back, plus a little extra, I just need a little more time.

nodes.message: Fifteen, Jabba. Don't push it.

message: Jabba
You're a wonderful human being.
She'll make point five beyond the speed of light.
She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts, kid. I've added some special modifications myself.
We're a little rushed, so if you'll hurry aboard we'll get out of here.

nodes.message: Chewie, get us out of here!

message: It looks like an Imperial cruiser. Our passengers must be hotter than I thought.
Try and hold them off. Angle the deflector shield while I make the calculations for the jump to light speed.
Watch your mouth, kid, or you're going to find yourself floating home.
We'll be safe enough once we make the jump to hyperspace. Besides, I know a few maneuvers. We'll lose them!

nodes.message: It'll take a few moments to get the coordinates from the navi-computer.

message: Traveling through hyperspace isn't like dusting crops, boy!
Without precise calculations we could fly right through a star or bounce too close to a supernova and that'd end your trip real quick, wouldn't it?

nodes.message: Here's where the fun begins!

message: Well, you can forget your troubles with those Imperial slugs. I told you I'd outrun 'em.
Don't everyone thank me at once.
Anyway, we should be at Alderaan about oh-two-hundred hours.

nodes.message: Let him have it. It's not wise to upset a Wookiee.

message: That's 'cause droids don't pull people's arms out of their socket when they lose.
Wookiees are known to do that.

nodes.message: Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid.

message: Kid, I've flown from one side of this galaxy to the other. I've seen a lot of strange stuff, but I've never seen anything to make me believe there's one all-powerful force controlling everything.
There's no mystical energy field that controls my destiny.
It's all a lot of simple tricks and nonsense.

nodes.message: Looks like we're coming up on Alderaan.
What the...? Aw, we've come out of hyperspace into a meteor shower. Some kind of asteroid collision. It's not on any of the charts.
Thats what I'm trying to tell you, kid. It ain't there. It's been totally blown away.
The entire starfleet couldn't destroy the whole planet. It'd take a thousand ships with more fire power than I've...
There's another ship coming in.
There aren't any bases around here. Where did it come from?
I think I can get him before he gets there... he's almost in range.

message: It's too big to be a space station.
Yeah, I think your right. Full reverse! Chewie, lock in the auxiliary power.
I use them for smuggling. I never thought I'd be smuggling myself in them. This is ridiculous.
Even if I could take off, I'd never get past the tractor beam.

nodes.message: Damn fool. I knew that you were going to say that!
Bring them on! I prefer a straight fight to all this sneaking around.

message: Whatever you say. I've done more that I bargained for on this trip already.
Boy you said it, Chewie. Where did you dig up that old fossil?

nodes.message: Yeah, great at getting us into trouble.
Princess? What's going on?
Now, look, don't get any funny ideas. The old man wants us to wait right here.
Better her than me...

message: __Chewbacca growls__
Rich?

nodes.message: What?
I don't know, I can imagine *quite a bit*!
I better!

message: All right, kid. But you'd better be right about this.
What's your plan?

nodes.message: Don't worry, Chewie. I think I know what he has in mind.
This is not going to work.
I did say so before!

message: Look out! He's loose!
Go get him!
We've got to find out which cell this princess of yours is in. Here it is... cell twenty-one-eight-seven. You go get her. I'll hold them here.
(into comlink) Uh... had a slight weapons malfunction. But, uh, everything's perfectly all right now. We're fine. We're all fine here, now, thank you. How are you?
__blasts comlink__
Boring conversation anyway.
Luke! We're going to have company!

nodes.message: Maybe you'd like it back in your cell, Your Highness.
He's the brains, sweetheart.

message: What the hell are you doing?
Get in there you big furry oaf! I don't care what you smell! Get in there and don't worry about it.

nodes.message: Wonderful girl! Either I'm going to kill her or I'm beginning to like her. Get in there!

message: The garbage chute was a really wonderful idea.
What an incredible smell you've discovered! Let's get out of here!
Absolutely, Your Worship. Look, I had everything under control until you led us down here.

nodes.message: It's worse.
That's your imagination.
What?
Luke! Luke! Luke!
Where?
I've got a bad feeling about this.
If we can just avoid any more female advice, we ought to be able to get out of here.
Look, Your Worshipfulness, let's get one thing straight! I take orders from one person! Me!
No reward is worth this.
There she is.
Nice! Come on!
Get back to the ship!

message: Didn't we just leave this party?
What kept you?

nodes.message: Seems okay, if we can get to it. Just hope the old man got the tractor beam out of commission.
I hope the old man got that tractor beam out if commission, or this is going to be a real short trip. Okay, hit it!
Come on, buddy, we're not out of this yet!
Great kid! Don't get cocky.
Not a bad bit of rescuing, huh? You know, sometimes I even amaze myself.
Easy... you call that easy?
Not this ship, sister.

message: It is for me, sister! Look, I ain't in this for your revolution, and I'm not in it for you, Princess.
I expect to be well paid. I'm in it for the money!

nodes.message: I'm trying not to, kid!
Still, she's got a lot of spirit. I don't know, what do you think? Do you think a princess and a guy like me...
__Han grins__

message: That's right, yeah! I got some old debts I've got to pay off with this stuff.
Even if I didn't, you don't think I'd be fool enough to stick around here, do you?
Why don't you come with us? You're pretty good in a fight. I could use you.

nodes.message: What good's a reward if you ain't around to use it? Besides, attacking that battle station ain't my idea of courage. It's more like suicide.
Hey, Luke... may the Force be with you!
What're you lookin' at? I know what I'm doing.
Yahoo!
You're all clear, kid. Now let's blow this thing and go home!
Great shot, kid. That was one in a million.
Well, I wasn't gonna let you get all the credit and take all the reward.
__winks during the medal ceremony__

edges.label: Yes indeed.
message: Yes indeed.
If it's a fast ship.

edges.label: Only passengers.
message: Only passengers. Myself, the boy, two droids.
And no questions asked.

edges.label: Imperial entanglements.
edges.message: Let's just say we'd like to avoid any Imperial entanglements.

edges.label: Ten thousand?
message: Ten thousand?
We could almost buy our own ship for that.

edges.label: Negotiate.
edges.message: We can pay you two thousand now, plus fifteen, when we reach Alderaan.

edges.label: You bet!
message: You bet I could! I'm not such a bad pilot myself! We don't have to sit here and listen to...
__Obi-Wan is calm__
We can pay you two thousand now, plus fifteen, when we reach Alderaan.

edges.label: __Jump to Greedo__
edges.message: Going somewhere, Solo?

edges.label: It's too late.
message: It's too late.
You should have paid him when you had the chance.
Jabba's put a price on your head so large every bounty hunter in the galaxy will be looking for you.
__hehehe__
I'm lucky I found you first.

edges.label: Give it to me.
edges.message: If you give it to me, I might forget I found you.

edges.label: No
message: Jabba's through with you.
He has no time for smugglers who drop their shipments at the first sign of an Imperial cruiser.

edges.label: __Stay as Greedo__
message: You can tell that to Jabba.
He may only take your ship.

edges.label: __Jump to Jabba__
edges.message: Ah!

edges.label: That's the idea.
message: That's the idea.
I've been looking forward to this for a long time...

edges.label: Bargain.
message: __In Huttese__
Han, my boy, I'm only doing this because you're the best and I need you.
So, for an extra twenty...

edges.label: __Huttese__
message: __Huttese__
__Huttese__
__Huttese...__

edges.label: To Docking Bay 94.
message: __Docking Bay 94__
What a piece of junk!

edges.label: Let's get out of here.
message: __Docking Bay 94__
What a piece of junk!

edges.label: Board the Falcon.
edges.message: __boards the ship__

edges.label: *Ship lurches*
message: *The ship shakes*
What's going on?

edges.label: Why don't you outrun them?
edges.message: Why don't you outrun them? I thought you said this thing was fast.

edges.label: How long for the jump?
edges.message: How long before you can make the jump to light speed?

edges.label: At this rate?
edges.message: Are you kidding? At the rate they're gaining...

edges.label: Watch Chewie play chess.
message: He made a fair move. Screaming about it won't help you.

edges.label: Watch lightsaber practice.
edges.message: __Watches Luke train with the remote__

edges.label: Nobody worries about a droid.
edges.message: But sir, nobody worries about upsetting a droid.

edges.label: Good point. Let the Wookiee win.
You don't believe in the Force?
edges.message: You don't believe in the Force, do you?

edges.label: Where is Alderaan?
edges.message: What do you mean? Where is it?

edges.label: How?
edges.message: What? How?

edges.label: It's an Imperial fighter.
edges.message: It's an Imperial fighter.

edges.label: Let's follow it.
edges.message: He's headed for that small moon.

edges.label: That's no moon!
edges.message: That's no moon! It's a space station.

edges.label: Leave that to me.
edges.message: Leave that to me!

edges.label: It's a wonder they don't know we're here.
edges.message: You know, between his howling and your blasting everything in sight, it's a wonder the whole station doesn't know we're here.

edges.label: Ben's going alone.
edges.message: I must go alone.

edges.label: Ben is a great man.
edges.message: Ben is a great man.

edges.label: R2 found the Princess!
message: I'm afraid I'm not quite sure, sir. He says "I found her", and keeps repeating, "She's here."
__Princess Leia__
She's scheduled to be terminated.

edges.label: We've got to help her.
edges.message: We've got to help her.

edges.label: They're going to execute her!
edges.message: But they're going to kill her!

edges.label: She's rich.
message: But,
She's rich.

edges.label: Rich and powerful.
message: Yes.
Rich, powerful! Listen, if you were to rescue her, the reward would be...

edges.label: More wealth than you can imagine.
edges.message: Well more wealth that you can imagine.

edges.label: You'll get it!
edges.message: You'll get it!

edges.label: We'll use Chewie as a 'prisoner'.
edges.message: Okay. Now, I'm going to put these on you... uh, Han, you put these on.

edges.label: Why didn't you say so before?
edges.message: Why didn't you say so before?

edges.label: *Luke returns with Leia* We're cut off!
edges.message: Looks like you managed to cut off our only escape route.

edges.label: Didn't you have a plan for getting out?
edges.message: This is some rescue. When you came in here, didn't you have a plan for getting out?

edges.label: Into the garbage chute, wise guy!
edges.message: Somebody has to save our skins. Into the garbage chute, wise guy.

edges.label: It could be worse...
edges.message: It could be worse...

edges.label: There's something alive in here!
edges.message: There's something alive in here!

edges.label: Something just moved past my leg!
edges.message: Something just moved past my leg! Look! Did you see that?

edges.label: Help! *gets pulled under*
edges.message: Help!

edges.label: My gun's jammed! Shoot it!
edges.message: Blast it, will you! My gun's jammed.

edges.label: Anywhere! *pulled under again*
edges.message: Anywhere! Oh!!

edges.label: From now on, you do as I tell you.
edges.message: Listen. I don't know who you are, or where you came from, but from now on, you do as I tell you. Okay?

edges.label: It's a wonder you're still alive.
edges.message: It's a wonder you're still alive.

edges.label: You came in that thing? You're braver than I thought.
edges.message: You came in that thing? You're braver that I thought.

edges.label: *Split up and meet back at the ship*
We ran into some old friends.
edges.message: We ran into some old friends.

edges.label: Got him! I got him!
message: __Get in gunport, start shooting__
Got him! I got him!

edges.label: They let us go. It's the only explanation.
edges.message: That doesn't sound too hard. Besides, they let us go. It's the only explanation for the ease of our escape.

edges.label: They're tracking us!
edges.message: They're tracking us!

edges.label: What's so important in that R2 unit?
message: At least the information in R2 is still intact.
The technical readouts of that battle station. I only hope that when the data is analyzed, a weakness can be found.
It's not over yet!

edges.label: If money is all you love, you'll receive it!
message: You needn't worry about your reward. If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive!
__Leia leaves__
So... what do you think of her, Han?

edges.label: Good...
edges.message: Good...

edges.label: No.
message: No.

edges.label: *Arrive at Yavin 4*
message: So... you got your reward and you're just leaving then?

edges.label: They could use a good pilot like you.
message: Come on! Why don't you take a look around?
You know what's about to happen, what they're up against.
They could use a good pilot like you. You're turning your back on them.

edges.label: Take care of yourself. That's what you're best at.
edges.message: All right. Well, take care of yourself, Han. I guess that's what you're best at, isn't it?

edges.label: __Chewie growls__
edges.message: __Chewie growls__

edges.label: I knew you'd come back!
message: *Land back at Yavin*
I knew you'd come back! I just knew it!

edges.label: I knew there was more to you than money.
edges.message: Hey, I knew there was more to you than money.
